p: A total of 13,239 people received 1 or more syphilis test (s) after the diagnosis of HIV infection between 2000 and 2010, resulting in an average annual study rate of 47.8% with the range of 37.7% to 66.5%. Of them, 4907 (37.1%) had syphilis tests annually. Demographic and clinical characteristics of patients with and without annual syphilis tests were summarized at Table 1.
